name: Anomiac.
description:
anomia /əˈnōmēə/ n. a form of aphasia in which the patient is unable to recall the names of everyday objects. 

“Anomiac.” is an exploration game about a little girl whose ability to communicate has been impaired due to having a stoke. Through dreaming, she experiences a vibrant, colorful, crazy world where she feels uninhibited and is able to experience the things she can’t while awake. 

“Anomiac.” was developed for the Dream Diary Jam 2 by Kip Icon Games using RPG Maker MV. It's a full game with a short playtime of about 15-30 minutes. Arrow keys move your character. "Z" interacts. "X" opens the menu.
